title: Spamton NEO

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player to veeerry slowly murder them. They die after two nights, assuming you haven't been roleblocked/controlled/redirected to someone else by then, and assuming they have not received protection of any kind in that time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target is aware that they are going to die.
- You will continuously visit your target until they die.
- You may attack another player while you're waiting on one to die already.
- You can't die under any circumstances, including hanging. However, you lose automatically if you're the last Town.

desc:
Post 3456
*DIDN'T YOU KNOW [Neo] IS FAMOUS FOR ITS HIGH DEFENSE!?*
